completion: UgandaEMR is a customization of OpenMRS for Uganda, initially starting with HIV related forms but later expanding to other areas such as Maternal and Child Health services, Tuberculosis treatment following guidelines issued by the Ministry of Health (MoH) under the Health Management Information System (HMIS) manuals.
1.Windows 7 (both 32-bit and 64-bit versions supported).2 4GB of RAM 3.5GHz duo core processor
1.Java 8 for UgandaEMR 2.0.0 and above (Java 7 for UgandaEMR 1.x - not recommended). 2 Tomcat 7 3. MySQL 5.5 4. Mozilla Firefox 44
